Considering its high quality and versatility, I propose a price of $200 for it. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable item at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:

(2) Reject Alice's offer
